name: Stronger Together. Save our planet
description:
Our planet is being invaded by outer space robots.  Destroy the enemies and the planet.  The player will be able up upgrade  their weapon by other characters help ( Stronger Together Theme) .

CONTROL

KEY A   move left

KEY D   move right

KEY K    shoot

KEY L    jump

KEY ESC  main menu

mouse click on conversation box.

The file on the browser, is a demo file. For the full game please download the executable file.
